main event: An unidentified round yellow object, the size of a grapefruit, was observed traveling at high speed near Rhine-Main Air Base in Germany on 13 April 1950.
interesting points: The object had no visible trail while flying,The sighting lasted for 3-4 minutes,Multiple reports suggest similar sightings of round yellow objects,The object was confirmed as possibly being an aircraft or a balloon,No other aircraft were reported in the area during the sighting.
witness description: Air Force personnel at Rhein-Main Air Base observed the object.
